category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 11 (Protection of Information Human Rights)
contents: Article 11 (Protection of Information Human Rights) ① The Sports Council guarantees the right to access information so that all citizens, including vulnerable groups, can be properly provided with and request information necessary for participation in sports. ② The Sports Council protects personal information acquired during business activities in accordance with personal information-related laws such as the Personal Information Protection Act. [Moved from Article 6, previous Article 11 moved to Article 6 2019. 11. 7.]
